main_definition: Cups is an informal idiom referring to a small amount or number, often used in counting or estimating.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used as a unit of measurement for volume equivalent to 8 fluid ounces (about 237 milliliters) in the United States
meanings_and_examples.example: She poured two cups of coffee into her mug.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Informal term used to denote a small quantity or amount, often when exact measurements are not needed
meanings_and_examples.example: I'll just need a couple of cups for the recipe.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used in expressions and idioms referring to a little bit or a short period of time
meanings_and_examples.example: That will only take two cups of your time.
